name: Stompy Dashy (Android Games)
description:
Hi there!

I'm Gus, and i'm solodev. I was released my first game called Stompy Dashy.

It's a endless runner 2d platformer type of game. Inspired from Jetpack Joyride and Flappy Bird. 

You can try it on Google Playstore on Android, and right now its just playable on Android. Maybe if you're using Bluestacks it will little bit buggy.

I will giving an update, such as map, character, and maybe power up items for the game.

Any support such as donation or suggestion and also critics for features or content for the game, would be helping me and i'm so much appreciate it.

Thanks for your time, have a nice day and happy gaming!

(note: Screenshot was outdated, will updating soon)
